ygData.subject: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm... You somehow want us to gather food and water for you? What sort of help do you need? Are you referring to the fact that forage maxes at 40 for bards?
ygData.messageBody:
Umm... You somehow want us to gather food and water for you? What sort of
help do you need? Are you referring to the fact that forage maxes at 40 for
bards? Keep in mind that we are travellers who like to end the journey at a
tavern or inn. Our interest in being able to gather nuts and berries to feed
on is rather low.

However, at level 20 I usually find no problem gathering up enough to tide
me over. I still carry some real food and water just in case I have a spot
of bad luck now and then though.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: Roop Dirump [mailto:roop@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 15, 1999 1:20 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Cap


From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>

CAN't ANY bards please help us on this?????

--.com>
>
>I've been stuck at skill level 40 in Forage ever since I picked up the
skill
>at lvl 12 (I'm now 16th). Very disappointing in that I can't really rely
on
>forage to provide 100% of my food and drink needs. Looks like it never
>will.
>
>-Alex
>aka: Goatnatos, Lvl 16 Bard, Povar Server
>
>> -----Original Message-----
